about_the_game:
Ash of Legends is an upcoming, made for VR, first-person-shooter, base building, tower defense, action-strategy game. Grapple around any map, build towers, place traps, shoot guns, launch arrows, and throw sabers, to defend the spores from hordes of the evil empire. Featuring an epic story, multiple heroes, verdant landscapes, and new game mechanics not seen before in a VR tower defense game. Options include smooth, teleport, head-based, controller-based locomotion, vignette, and more. Includes native Meta Quest with Link and Steam VR support.

Features:
  • 2 playable heroes: Soldier and Strategist
  • 7 scenes: Tutorial, Hangar, Orchard, City, River, Underground River, and Forest
  • 3 difficulties: Easy, Normal, and Hard
  • 1 challenge mode: AirDrop
  • 20+ hours of gameplay
  • 9 enemy types
  • A dozen weapons
  • More than a dozen traps and towers
  • 4 comfort features: Vignette, Teleport, Snap turning, Arm swing locomotion
  • 8 modes of locomotion: Grappling, Climbing, Hang Gliding, Hovercraft, Driving a boat, Arm swing, Teleport, and the standard thumbstick-based movement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR and Meta Quest with Link
